jmortgage.amortization
Class DefaultFixedAmortizationBuilder.DefaultPayment

java.lang.Object
  jmortgage.amortization.DefaultFixedAmortizationBuilder.DefaultPayment
All Implemented Interfaces:
FixedAmortizationBuilder.Payment
Enclosing class:
DefaultFixedAmortizationBuilder
public final class DefaultFixedAmortizationBuilder.DefaultPayment
extends Object
implements FixedAmortizationBuilder.Payment

The default implementation of FixedAmortizationBuilder.Payment. This object calculates the total amount of the payment, the principal paid, the interest paid, the balance due after the payment, and the cumulative interest paid after the payment.

Field Summary
 
Fields inherited from interface jmortgage.amortization.FixedAmortizationBuilder.Payment

getPmtStats

public double[] getPmtStats()
Gets the payment stats as an array of doubles. The stats are in the array in the following order: total, principal, interest, cumulative interest, and balance. All values are returned rounded.

Specified by:
getPmtStats in interface FixedAmortizationBuilder.Payment
Returns:
all payment stats in an array of doubles
